item.description:
Meet at my home around 7 for games, and bring any of your games that you may want to play too! Monday is a holiday for most people so I hope Sunday night works for you! Please byob and/or light snack or dessert.  By popular demand, if everyone wants to sit by the campfire at night, we can do that too!  Any ideas for campfire fun, bring the ideas along as well.

Call me with questions or if you get lost.  860-477-0335

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Twister and other games and have fun! Multi-group event
